sources.title: West Of Zanzibar (Original Soundtrack)
sources.description: 1928 directed by Tod Browning starring Lon Chaney, Lionel Barrymore, Warner Baxter and Jacqueline Gadsden with Mary Nolan, Tiny Ward, Kalla Pasha and Curtis Nero. Crippled during a fight with his wifeâ€™s lover and as a result becoming seedy, plotting and vengeful, a professional magician plots a horrible revenge on both the man and his daughter. Soundtrack contains two brief clips of classical music easily recognized and two pieces by Bull of Heaven: "Night's Great Perimeter" and "Following the Sand," as well as added sound effects throughout.
